Sentencas: The integration of renewable energy into industrial processes has a high potential for moving to a competitive low-carbon economy in 2050, as targeted by the European Commission.
Titulo: Operational Results of an 150/30 kW RSOC System in an Industrial Environment

Sentencas: The vision of the GrInHy project is to provide 'green' hydrogen via electrolysis using renewable electricity and to provide grid management services as a reversible generator in the iron-and-steel works of Salzgitter Flachstahl GmbH (Germany).
Titulo: Operational Results of an 150/30 kW RSOC System in an Industrial Environment

Sentencas: Therefore, an reverse solid oxide cell (RSOC) system was built with a nominal electrolyzer power consumption of 150 kW(AC) and a power output of 30 kW(AC) in fuel cell operation with hydrogen, respectively, 25 kW(AC) with natural gas.
Titulo: Operational Results of an 150/30 kW RSOC System in an Industrial Environment

Sentencas: A key outcome of the project is to prove high system efficiencies up to 84%(LHV) in electrolysis mode and more than 50%(LHV) in fuel cell mode with natural gas are achievable in a real life system.
Titulo: Operational Results of an 150/30 kW RSOC System in an Industrial Environment

Sentencas: It also showed long-term operability at degradation rates < 1% kh(-1).
Titulo: Operational Results of an 150/30 kW RSOC System in an Industrial Environment

Sentencas: The findings and results of the first 5,000 h of operation are presented in this paper.
Titulo: Operational Results of an 150/30 kW RSOC System in an Industrial Environment

Sentencas: The GrInHy prototype demonstrates the technical feasibility of the integration of an RSOC system in an industrial environment as flexible load or power source.
Titulo: Operational Results of an 150/30 kW RSOC System in an Industrial Environment

Sentencas: It proves that steam electrolyzers have reached a technical readiness that allows their scale-up to a level at which real life customer demands can be covered.
Titulo: Operational Results of an 150/30 kW RSOC System in an Industrial Environment
